title: Worlds finals
body:
I really hope that KOO vs SKT goes to 5 games. The elimination portion has been a huge disappointment. Only 2 out of the 6 series have had a team win a game but not the series, and they only won 1 game each. The other 4 series were clean sweeps. 0 have gone to all 5 games...

Thought this was supposed to be the #goldenage or something...

replies.body: Golden age was a CLG thing, it didn't last very long.
